name: gl-react-expo
author: GaÃ«tan Renaudeau <renaudeau.gaetan@gmail.com>
description: React Native via Expo implementation of gl-react, an universal React library to write and compose WebGL shaders

scripts.build: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH && cd - &&rm -rf lib && babel --source-maps -d lib src && flow-copy-source -v src lib
scripts.watch: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --watch --source-maps -d lib src
